Token.Abstract: The Bit6MenuControllerDelegate protocol defines methods that your delegate object must implement to allow the standard UIMenuController to be shown on a UIView element related to a Bit6Message with options like 'forward a sent message', 'send again a failed message' and 'copy text'.
If implemented, the "forward" action will be available in the standard UIMenuController. Tells the delegate that the "forward" menu was pressed.

Parameter.Name: msg
Parameter.Abstract: The Bit6Message object to be forwarded.

Token.Abstract: If implemented, the "send" action will be available in the standard UIMenuController. Tells the delegate that the "send" menu was pressed.

Parameter.Name: msg
Parameter.Abstract: The Bit6Message object to be send again.
